column4: I want to upgrade edgy-fiesty .... i need a sources.list file !!!!
run the system update applet, it will give you a button to click

no it's not that , the last time i upgraded from dapper->edgy , and it faild, and a guy here gave me a sources.list file , and it worked, but now , the same problem happened with edgy->fiesty , so i wanted to know if someone has that file
